UVI.description: In Nissan Leaf EV (car) version 2018 SV a Denial of Service exists in the Head Unit Display that can be attacked via Local Access resulting in Denial of Service (HUD being disabled).

OSV.summary: Denial of Service in Leaf EV (car) version 2018 SV
OSV.details: In Nissan Leaf EV (car) version 2018 SV a Denial of Service exists in the Head Unit Display that can be attacked via Local Access resulting in Denial of Service (HUD being disabled).
